nodes.text: Golin was a Saurin male who lived in the outskirts of Lund Gourley on the planet Durkteel. In 34 ABY, he left Durkteel to join Leia Organa's Resistance.
Golin first appeared in Join the Resistance, a junior novel written by Ben Acker and Ben Blacker, published by Disney–Lucasfilm Press, and released on March 7, 2017.
